item.title: 2020/2021 Tokyo Olympics Soccer Schedule
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description:
The following is the Tokyo 2020 Olympic football schedule, which will be held in 2021 due to the pandemic, for the men’s and women’s teams. Initially, the Tokyo Olympics were scheduled to take place from July 24 to August 9, 2020. However, this world multi-sports event was then affected by the COVID-19 pandemic, so it […]
